snippet: The Short North neighborhood is humming with an eclectic cultural scene, and new development barely slowed during the recession.
abstract: Short North neighborhood in Columbus, Ohio, is thriving with an eclectic cultural scene, and new development that barely slowed during the recession; transformation of the area began in the 1980s.
lead_paragraph: The Short North neighborhood is humming with an eclectic cultural scene, and new development barely slowed during the recession.

headline.seo: In Columbus, Ohio, the Short North Arts Belt Is Thriving
headline.main: In Columbus, Ohio, an Arts Belt Is Thriving
headline.print_headline: In Columbus, Ohio, an Arts Belt Is Thriving
